page.title: 02 RUGELEY SCHOOL GAMES.
page.content: For British Bulldog we stand at one end of the playground and the person who is on chooses someone to run to the other side of the playground. If he tigs him, he is on with him. The second person picks someone to run.This time you have to hold on to the person and say "One, two three British Bulldog." If he isn't caught all the other people try to run to the other side and back. When someone is caught the number to hold them increases up to ten, then it is "hold" until it is ten all round. When everyone is caught the first one who was caught starts the next game.
